Package main

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Player
  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages player state and associated player manipulation functions

      Moves the Player forward in current direction by one place Rests player if fallen of board

      Loops though initial position(ip), North of ip, East of ip, South of ip and West of ip in order looks for first available location and places player at that location Sets direction to North Sets health to 5

              int y,
              Board board,

        Parameters:
        x - initial x coordinate
        y - initial y coordinate
        board - reference to the main board
        repr - player representation

      • decreaseHealth

        public void decreaseHealth​(int factor)
        Decreases player health by value specified in factor
        Parameters:
        factor - factor to decrease health by

      • checkWin

        public boolean checkWin()
        Checks if the player has won
        Returns:
        a Boolean which specifies true if the player has won, and false otherwise

      • addFlag

        public void addFlag​(Flag flag)
        Adds flag to player. Checks if flag is in the right order before adding
        Parameters:
        flag - flag to be added

      • fireLaser

        public void fireLaser()
        Decreases health of first player found directly in front of player

      • activateEntity

        public void activateEntity()
        calls BoardEntity.act(Player, BoardEntity) of BoardEntity player is on top of

      • restPlayer

        public void restPlayer()
        Loops though initial position(ip), North of ip, East of ip, South of ip and West of ip in order looks for first available location and places player at that location Sets direction to North Sets health to 5

      • turnACW90

        public void turnACW90​(int multiplier)
        Turns the player anti clockwise by 90 degrees
        Parameters:
        multiplier - how many times the player will turn

      • turnCW90

        public void turnCW90​(int multiplier)
        Turns the player clockwise by 90 degrees
        Parameters:
        multiplier - how many times the player will turn
